title: Roosevelt's Polio Wasn't A Secret: He Used It To His 'Advantage'
teaser: In The Man He Became, historian James Tobin says, despite misimpressions to the contrary, Americans of Franklin Roosevelt's day were well-aware of his disability. Originally aired Nov. 25, 2013.
